CINE_FromPLA.synopsis: Cinematic Cutscene with the character using an elevator to get from the Zhentarim Hideout to the Underdark
CINE_FromPLA.how_to_trigger: Repro steps:1. Start the game2. loadlevel WLD_Main_A3. goto 248 -1904. SetGlobalOsirisFlag PLA_ZhentDungeon_State_LiftFixed5. Click on the lift.6. ReCon: "oe und_cine_reset" -  this will allow to see the cinematic again when clicking on the lift (by default the game shows it only once)

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Analyzing the session names and the available description for CINE_FromPLA, we note that this session shows a cinematic cutscene in which the character uses an elevator to go from the Zhentarim Hideout (which we associate with the tag PLA) toward the Underdark. The naming convention of the sessions suggests a directional or transitional progression. In particular, CINE_FromPLA appears to be an early transition sequence (the player leaves the PLA location), while CINE_ToSHA seems to indicate a cinematic that leads the player toward a location or state identified by SHA. Finally, CINE_FromSHA implies a cinematic related to exiting or coming from the SHA-related location. In a logical narrative order the player would first experience CINE_FromPLA, then move into a scene that is represented by CINE_ToSHA (arriving at or engaging with the SHA context), and finally, if applicable, see CINE_FromSHA as the consequence or departure from that environment. There is no clear indication in the provided data that any two of these sessions are mutually exclusive (that is, the presence or occurrence of one precludes the occurrence of another), so we do not enforce any exclusivity rules.
